message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I understand your position, but unfortunately, $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, though. Would you consider $11,000? This is still a fair price for both of us, and it gives you a good deal. Let's see if we can find some common ground!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I'm interested in purchasing the product, I'm still not able to go above $10,500. This feels like a fair compromise given the value of the product to me. I hope this meets your expectations.
